channel.title: Special attacks
channel.description:
how do i add special attacks to a server/client?
:confused:

item.title: Special attacks
item.dc:creator: @josh1993nhs josh1993nhs
item.description:
@josh1993nhs wrote:

If your using a delta, like this :

(Use this step only if your weapon doesnt alredy have a special attack bar)
Go into your special.java

Search for switch(item) {

Once found add this in with the other caseâ€™scase xxxx:(replace the xxxx with the weapon item id.)

Search for switch(item) { again and repeat.

Once you finish with adding the cases, open your client.java.

Search for if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon].

You should come up with something along the lines of this - if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == XXXX && specialAmount > 24){ setAnimation(30); specGFX(60); specialAtk(false, 75, 600, 303); getHit(20); hitDiff = misc.random(55); }

The XXXX Would be the itemid
The 24 is the special attack Percentage.
setAnimation Is the emote it will do
specGFX is the gfx it will do

Im not going into too much detail on this, theres a ton of guides for it.

Heres one : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,446309.0.html

Read full topic
